main event: Observers in Augusta, Georgia reported seeing a bright light moving from west to east on June 30, 1967.
interesting points: The object seemed to get larger and brighter as it moved,It then appeared to decrease in size and headed southwest until disappearing,Observers reported that the object traveled in a straight line and did not resemble any aircraft they were familiar with,No sound was reported during the sighting,The report concluded that the object might have been a satellite or a meteor.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
